text:
@GavinNewsom "We cannot ignore #COVID19 because it’s inconvenient ..."
unless theres a left wing protest.

"If we work together, we can flatten the curve."

The curve was flattened, then people gathered in large groups and you applauded it and now there's a 2nd wave.
